item.title: Installing VMware ESXi on an Intel J1900
item.description: Attempting to install ESXi on an Intel J1900 results in an error. The boot process freezes on: Relocating modules and starting up the kernel… The fix can be found at: https://web.archive.org/web/20210128055950/https://talesfromthedatacenter.com/2016/02/esxi-6-install-stuck-on-relocating-modules-and-starting-up-the-kernel/ In short, At the ESXi boot screen, press Shift+O to open the boot options prompt. In the boot options line that appears, add the following after a space at the end of the line: ignoreHeadless=TRUE. After the installation finishes, boot into ESXi using the ignoreHeadless=TRUE boot option.
